Member Function Documentation

void ting::UDPSocket::Open (  )  [inline]
void ting::UDPSocket::Open ( u16  port  )  [inline]

Open the socket.

This mthod opens the socket, this socket can further be used to send or receive data. After the socket is opened it becomes a valid socket and Socket::IsValid() will return true for such socket. After the socket is closed it becomes invalid. In other words, a valid socket is an opened socket. In case of errors this method throws Socket::Exc.

Parameters:
port - IP port number on which the socket will listen for incoming datagrams. This is useful for server-side sockets, for client-side sockets use UDPSocket::Open().
